error.message: Unexpected "string" keyword after "@" character. Once inside code, you do not need to prefix constructs like "string" with "@".
error.detail:
System.Web.HttpParseException (0x80004005): Unexpected "string" keyword after "@" character. Once inside code, you do not need to prefix constructs like "string" with "@".

error.webHostHtmlMessage:
'/' 應用程式中發生伺服器錯誤。

剖析器錯誤

描述: 當剖析服務此要求所需的資源時發生錯誤。請檢閱下列的特定剖析錯誤詳細資訊，並且適當地修改您的原始程式檔。

剖析器錯誤訊息: Unexpected "string" keyword after "@" character.  Once inside code, you do not need to prefix constructs like "string" with "@".


原始程式錯誤: 


行 20: 				break;
行 21: 			default:
行 22: 				@string.Empty
行 23: 				break;
行 24: 		}

原始程式檔: /Views/Account/Login.cshtml    行: 22
